Nightlight::

Nightlight kissed him and said "I'll help our fellows and I see you 
later in the base love"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> 
> rattrap re-enter the maximal basae and ask kup" where is the cr its 
been so long since i used one"
>  RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:: : Rodimus Prime : : Rodimus 
relaxed a bit at Hydras flew off. The Predacons had started to 
retreat. Things wern't ok yet though, Tyrael's ship was destroyed. 
What was left was laying outfront the Maximal base. Luckily the Maxi 
base was fine. The shields had been damaged but were not taken down. 
There was also the matter of this strange bot that was telling 
everyone to leave the planet. Rodimus decided to handle this. Rodimus 
first finds Nightlight and puts his arm around her. She was ok. 
Rodimus Prime: Maximals help find any injured Maximals or other 
allies. Get everyone to CR's. Pay special attention to the Tripred 
ship. We could have lost guys in the crash. Rodimus now turns to the 
demanding newcomer. Rodimus Prime: On whos authority do you evict us 
from Earth?
